pullrequest.title: add support for 'stopCmd' and 'logsCmd' in simulations, and other changes

content.raw:
Just verifying how we should call the APIs on the client, something like this?

~~~
# Start simulation
POST: /simulations
{
  cmd: 'run_gazebo.bash',
  stopCmd: 'stop_gazebo.bash',
  logCmd: 'send_logs.bash',
  auto: true
}

# Stop simulation
GET: /stopsimulations
~~~
content.html:
Just verifying how we should call the APIs on the client, something like this?

# Start simulation
POST: /simulations
{
  cmd: 'run_gazebo.bash',
  stopCmd: 'stop_gazebo.bash',
  logCmd: 'send_logs.bash',
  auto: true
}

# Stop simulation
GET: /stopsimulations
